title: League Client Installer Help
body: im running at 0kbps but its extremely slowing going up in percent like every hour it goes up 1, ever since i got to the 66 its stuck its current 71% anyone to help me

replies.body:
Happens to me whenever there's a moderately big patch. What I do, is wait until it gets to the point were it says "0 kbps", then I disconnect my internet for a minute, and reconnect without closing the client.

It should start loading again after about five minutes.
